name: basic-vite-react
label: Basic Template
description: Lightweight Vite starter template for building fast static websites

name: 2d-phaser-sprite-character-gravity
label: 2D Phaser Sprite Character Gravity Template
description: Template with animated sprite characters using Phaser, featuring gravity for jumping mechanics. Ideal for basic PLATFORMER games.

name: basic-3d-game
label: Basic 3D Game Template
description: Template for building 3D games using Three.js and react-three-fiber. Perfect for creating immersive 3D environments, first-person experiences, and interactive 3D visualizations.

name: basic-3d-character-animation
label: 3D Character Animation Template
description: Template for implementing 3D rigged(mixamo) character with animations using Three.js. Features GLB model loading, animation system for creating interactive 3D character models.

name: basic-3d-isometric-keyboard-control
label: Basic 3D Isometric Keyboard Control Template
description: Template for creating isometric 3D games using Three.js and react-three-fiber. Features include GLB model loading, character animation system, isometric camera, rapier physics, and keyboard controls.

name: basic-3d-third-person-shooter
label: Basic 3D Third Person Shooter Template
description: Template for creating third person shooter games using Three.js and react-three-fiber. Features include GLB model loading, character animation system, third person camera, rapier physics, and mouse with keyboard controls.
